attributes.description: DATSUN, We are Driven - Arriving soon, the very sporty and snazzy 2018 Datsun GO 1.2 LUX. And what makes this vehicle different - the cabin quality is better, 2 individual seats in the front, conventional handbrake. There's an all-new touchscreen infotainment system, rear parking sensors but the significant change is the safety features. The driver's airbag has been joined by a 2nd airbag for the front passenger and crucially, an anti-lock braking system has been fitted.  The great news is that the new Go feels more solidly assembled and -finished. The gear action is light and smooth. In terms of interior quality it is much more comfortable and neat and well rounded off. Overall this little vehicle has had a good make over and is very economical. Very comfortable for the entire family. A full Dekra condition and roadworthy. price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab. More images to follow.

attributes.description:
The sporty i20 N Line comes in white or red with a black two-tone roof. Inside, you can look forward to the iconic black artificial leather interior with red N line trim. Safety & comfort also go hand in hand with this high-performance hatchback featuring ABS + ESC + HAC & Auto Temp Control Air Con.
The sporty i20 N Line comes in white or red with a black two-tone roof. Inside, you can look forward to the iconic black artificial leather interior with red N line trim. Safety & comfort also go hand in hand with this high-performance hatchback featuring ABS + ESC + HAC & Auto Temp Control Air Con.
From the interior finish and layout to the exterior, the new i20 is a display of daring style and unforgettable memories waiting to happen. It comes complete with comprehensive safety features for the road ahead, and a host of premium features to be enjoyed by you and your crew.
